title: getting sick of freezing
body:
it's been going on a while now, started i think last week? small and to be fair, not even problematic, minion HP bars staying at 100% HP for a second too long or damage numbers popping up later than you'd expect, no biggy, the game was fine

yesterday stuff got nasty, i started freezing in place, costing me duels i'd have won, or ganks i'd have escaped otherwise, i assumed that was my internet as i had had a disconect earlier that day

so this morning i start my PC and don't open league, i browse imgur a bit, watch some youtube, checked every internet cable in the house, internet was fine, so yeah, i'll go play some league!

the first 4 minutes where lovely, then every champion on screen would freeze in place and 3 seconds later they'd all be somewhere else and one or two of my team where dead because i couldn't do a thing to help, i'd get rooted by morg and halfway through get frozen again and by the time i could move again i could only curse and swear as the second mogQ hit

i froze so much i didn't get to play league, I WATCHED A SLIDESHOW OF IT
my champion got stuck so often, I CAN UPLOAD THE VIDEO TO REDTUBE AND TAG IT AS BONDAGE PORN
if this game was pay to play i would probably even consider demanding my money back and then some

all i want to know is what the f**k is going on? i checked my cables again, opened freaking 20 youtube tabs trying to crash my PC in hopes it IS my internet, but i can't find anything on my end, everything on my end has been running perfectly since this morning, until i started up league of legends and the game froze up for long enough for me to go bake a pizza from scratch in between being able to issue a movement command

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be an issue along your route to the server that could be causing the problem. What you're experiencing sounds a lot like bursts of packet loss and generally is characterized by your character "running in place", not responding to commands or even delays in actions that are being taken in game. I'm happy to hear things are looking a bit more normal, but I'd still recommend ensuring your local network settings are at least aligned with those outlined in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you see this issue persist or get worse.

hey, thanks for the reply, since yesterday night i haven't had any major issues in game (client remains defiant) i'll look into the connection guide and download the tool thing (god i closed the tab 3 seconds ago and i forgot the name already)

as for now, the game runs fine, so i'm inclined to believe it was either a big internet problem where i live, or something on your end

ya they did some work on the server early in the morning and every since i have had the same thing and i keep having issues with the client all around it dissconnects me from chat and always says retrieving data from server even in custom games
yeah it's back down to "normal" still get a freeze on occasion but it's playable at least
